title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice for 2 hours.
Add grilled chicken and cream. Cook 5 mins.
